title: Makeena
blurb: Making better products affordable no matter where you shop.
description: Makeena rewards consumers for buying “better,” while providing brands with real-time shopper insights. Our app captures all receipt data, as well as other engagements, while our dashboard provides brands access to that data to drive repeat purchase behavior.

title: Blowup 2020
blurb: Let's get together  and tell 2020 to fuck off 🧨
description: This is a custom minecraft server and every time someone writes fuck 2020 into the twitch chat or clicks the button on the website, it will add a 🧨 TNT block to the block text 2020.

title: Prosocial Design Library
blurb: UI elements that could help users get along.
description: The Prosocial Design Library is a pattern library of evidence-backed design elements, which claim to induce prosocial outcomes. Examples of prosocial outcomes include: less dysfunction in communities, and more understanding among users.

title: Elementor Cloud Beta
blurb: Fastest way to create WordPress sites, now in the Cloud.
description: The Elementor Cloud [Beta] lets anyone create fully hosted, professional WordPress websites with Elementor. In minutes, your new cloud website will be ready for you to design with Elementor Pro included and no additional installations required.

title: Workload by Soon
blurb: Mission control for your support team's daily activities
description: Soon is employee scheduling for customer support teams. Get the full picture of your team’s daily workload in real-time. Control capacity, schedule activities and optimize coverage on an interval level.

title: The Startup's Gambit
blurb: Which chess opening best captures your startup’s strategy?
description: To quote Netflix's Queen's Gambit "Chess isn't always competitive. Chess can also be beautiful." The Oxford Companion to Chess lists numerous openings that involve all kinds of wild tactical play. Find out which one best captures your startup’s strategy.

title: Deadlines
blurb: A simple, offline deadline tracker
description: Deadlines is a simple, offline deadline tracker made with Vue.js and localForage. All data is stored locally in the browser 🔐. You can import/export deadlines from/to a JSON file. It also has dark mode 🌓.

title: Modern Memories
blurb: Letters written today. Delivered in the future.
description: Modern Memories creates “kits” which contain stationery for the recipient to fill out and mail back to Modern Memories. Each kit contains four letters, which we will mail back in the future (6 months, 1 year, 5 years, 10 years later).

title: SimplyDocs
blurb: Form Builder, Doc Generation, Doc Publishing & Proposals.
description: SimplyDocs is a platform which helps you create and manage web forms, generate filled documents, publish the documents for almost everything and raise business proposals.

title: Looxie
blurb: Location-based photo requests
description: It's easy: go on the map, tap on another user, and send them a request for a photo! Gallery uploads are not allowed, so any photo they send will be taken on the spot, which means extra fresh photos on delivery!

title: Sleep Cinema
blurb: Interactive cinema for your dreams
description: Sleep Cinema is an app which takes a revolutionary approach to sleep. Now you are able to choose any kind of dream you will see at night. Two main things you need - your headphones or speakers and an installed application on your smartphone.

title: Cabana 4
blurb: Design system for Figma
description: Spending too much time bringing your ideas to life? ⠀ Imagine if you could massively speed up the process of designing prototypes, and presenting design ideas to your team, and clients. ⠀ Well, with Cabana 4 for Figma you can.

title: NoteView
blurb: Easily share results from Jupyter notebooks
description: NoteView lets you create beautiful, sharable reports from notebooks in under a minute! Just select the cells you want to share, make edits, and receive a cleaned up report with a link for your collaborators, where they can provide feedback.

title: Covid Travel Planner by Headout
blurb: Track COVID-19 travel restrictions around the globe
description: The Covid Travel Planner, created and managed by Headout, exists to help travelers find their next destination by helping them stay on top of the fluid patchwork of quarantine rules, health protocols, reopening status, and travel restrictions around the globe.

title: Mailchimp Newsletters widget by LiveChat
blurb: Get more newsletter signups from your website
description: LiveChat newest integration with Mailchimp helps you get in touch with your website visitors by displaying an interactive greeting that allows them to sign up to your newsletter list.

title: remonade
blurb: Hassle-free management tool for remote teams
description: remonade is a daily task management and communication tool for remote and distributed teams. No matter where you are, get your team's performance in real-time.

title: Haven Simple by Haven Life
blurb: Haven Simple is life insurance that is 100% no exam.
description: Haven Simple is a type of term life insurance policy that never requires a medical exam. You can apply online and, if approved, start coverage immediately. Seriously, you could do the whole thing over lunch.

title: Everypixel Patterns
blurb: Customizable seamless patterns for designers
description: Choose a pattern idea or create a new one, and refine it in minutes. 🎄Holiday offer! A Christmas patterns pack is available for Product Hunt users! Click ‘Exclusive Collection’ on the main page. All the patterns are totally free (for commercial use too).

title: Roombuddy
blurb: Find and match your perfect roommate
description: Roombuddy is a friendly platform that helps people find roommates in a more entertaining way. Through our ice-cream configurator, you can match potential roommates that have the same tastes as yours. As simple as that: happy roommates live longer together! 🥳

title: EarlyBird
blurb: Simple way for you to invest in a child’s financial future.
description: EarlyBird is a gifting platform, financial technology, and mobile app that empowers parents, family, and friends to collectively invest in the financial future of a child.

title: Mega Forms
blurb: Drag & drop, easy-to-use form builder for WordPress.
description: Mega Forms is highly advanced contact form builder for WordPress. Mega Forms offers a flexible row/column layout system that requires very minimal effort to design a form that blends nicely with your website layout.

title: MyWebAR 2.0
blurb: The easiest way to create webAR
description: MyWebAR is the easiest way to build cross-platform augmented reality instantly available in a browser. Whether you are a professional developer or have no prior experience, we have the set of tools that will allow you to get started in the matter of minutes.

title: Fellow + Zapier Integration
blurb: Meeting automation made easy with Fellow + Zapier ⚡️
description: Zapier allows you to instantly connect Fellow with popular apps like Trello, Monday, Todoist, Airtable, HubSpot, and more to automate your meeting workflows and find your productivity superpowers 🙌

title: Crowdfunded
blurb: A database of 60,000+ crowdfunding campaigns
description: Crowdfunded provides a database with extensive data on 2,000+ crowdfunding campaigns. You can use it to understand customer demand, discover successful product categories, see what competitors are launching, and find promising product ideas.

title: Fastival
blurb: Discover the power of intermittent fasting
description: Fastival is an intermittent fasting app which supports you to take breaks from eating to feel healthier and lose weight. Intermittent fasting boosts your immune system by giving your body time to digest food better and in turn strengthen the body’s defenses.

title: Whisk on Slack
blurb: Find, share & save recipes with coworkers via Whisk on Slack
description: Whisk on Slack makes it super easy to: find new recipes based on ingredients, share recipes from your saved recipes, save recipes to your recipe box, and more.

title: Nots
blurb: A free beautifully designed note-taking app for your desktop
description: Your note-taking app for your projects and sacred ideas. Stay organized and tidy by linking your notes inside of the app.

title: Vocalley
blurb: Consume & react to most relevant news from your network
description: Vocalley is a new way to consume and react to the most relevant news around you by adding a 30-sec opinion-videos or comments on your news feed. Add fresh news & start a conversation on topics that interests you. Vocalley democratises the news consumption!

title: WP Snow Effect
blurb: Add animation effect of falling snow to your WP site
description: Add nice looking animation effect of falling snow to your WordPress site and enjoy winter and Christmas.

title: Musicspace 2.0
blurb: Music catalog management & protection for musicians.
description: Musicspace is the easy way for musicians to organize and protect their entire music catalog in one beautiful dashboard.

title: My Site Archive
blurb: The simplest way to archive your website.
description: My Site Archive captures screenshots, downloads source code, and monitors DNS records helping you keep track of changes on your websites without needing to restore from a backup. Think of it like the Wayback Machine on steroids.

title: Clearout 2.0
blurb: 98%+ accurate real-time & bulk email verification services
description: Clearout is the most accurate and top-preferred online email verification platform created to ensure that we don’t let the honeypots, hard bounces and non-valid emails mess with your email deliverability. validate, verify & clean your email list in real-time.

title: Kudos by DailyBot
blurb: Give positive feedback and align team+culture with Kudos.
description: Kudos is the easiest way to celebrate wins with your team and align everyone around your core values. Create reward systems and encourage a culture of positive feedback across the company, right from your favorite chat platform.

title: Spotiplus 2.0
blurb: Design Spotify cover arts like a pro for iPhone and Android
description: SpotiPlus, is an easy-to-use tool dedicated to design nice looking cover arts for your Spotify playlists, tracks, albums, podcast. From Rock to Hip Hop, the app offers a variety of ready to use styles and templates for everyone!

title: Tunnels
blurb: An apocalyptic choose-your-own-ending game
description: Tunnels is a text-based "Choose-your-own-ending" game set in a world post-apocalypse. --- It contains: - 21 hand-drawn illustrations - 9 main story endings - 3 unlockable side stories, each with 3 different endings --- Collect them all!

title: Cantanding Online Karaoke
blurb: Sing Karaoke online with friends
description: Cantanding is the simplest and most complete online karaoke. Try searching any artist or song you can imagine, and start singing from any device.

title: Sovryn
blurb: Decentralized Bitcoin trading and lending platform
description: Sovryn is a decentralized application allowing users to trade Bitcoin on Layer 2 in a permissionless, noncustodial, and censorship-resistant way. It allows users to leverage Bitcoin up to 5x, and earn interest, without sacrificing their security or privacy.

title: Beatsy
blurb: Augmented reality music visualizer for iOS
description: Beatsy is an augmented reality music visualizer for iOS that uses your music or voice to modify the world around you. Turn your wall into a giant speaker or transform a road into a rolling wave of notes.

title: Epomaker GK96S
blurb: A compact, wireless mechanical keyboard
description: A 96-key wireless mechanical keyboard that provides a southpaw version in the Epomaker series. It’s born to free up your desk as well as providing a better portable experience without compromising on the perfect tactile typing experience.

title: Beacon
blurb: Calculate a webpages footprint what you can do to about it.
description: Calculate a website’s environmental impact, see the breakdown and learn what measures can be taken to improve it.

title: Ikes
blurb: The best way to capture & manage ideas
description: Have you ever experienced that ideas you found are buried in an unarranged pile of memos or bookmarks? With ikes you can not only quickly capture ideas from anywhere even in 3rd party apps, but also find useful ideas later on with a variety of search options.

title: CaptionSaver Pro for Google Meet
blurb: Auto-save live captions from Google Meet to Google Drive
description: Focus on your meetings and https://captionsaver.com will take care of your notes. Automatically save Google Meet captions to Google Drive!

title: Storrito for Facebook Stories
blurb: Auto story posting for Instagram and Facebook
description: Storrito lets you prepare and schedule Instagram and Facebook stories from your browser without any notifications. Create your Story with many Instagram Stickers, like hashtags, usermentions, location, swipe up links and much more.

title: WA! Gmail Add-on
blurb: Get your prospect full story at a glance.
description: Workspace Automation allows you to get a 360° overview of your contact from all your tools right within your Gmail inbox. Retrieve Contact's details from your CRM or your Helpdesk – explore Opportunities or Tickets associated with them and more!

title: Widget-Board
blurb: Visual planning, curating and productivity tool
description: A productivity tool that lets you create custom boards with your favorite widgets such as tasks, notes, media, date & time, weather, calendar and so much more! Mindmap your ideas, manage your projects and create collections of anything - all in one place.

title: Breadwinner
blurb: A community that loves baking just as much as you do.
description: Breadwinner is a community for you to find what to bake, see what others are baking, and establish a home for your starter on the web. Check out our tag-based search engine that makes it incredibly easy to find a great recipe.

title: hire.AR
blurb: A job board for augmented reality jobs.
description: Find your next job in augmented reality. Filter by position, & search by tags. Subscribe to our newsletter and receive AR jobs directly to your inbox.

title: Holiday Card Maker by PhotoRoom
blurb: Generate an awesome holiday card from any photo
description: Holiday Card Marker generates fantastic holiday cards from any portrait photo. It uses PhotoRoom's background removal AI, places the portrait in the card, and creates dozens of Christmas cards automagically.

title: BreadMe
blurb: Take the guesswork out of planning your bake days.
description: If you are baking bread yourself, you probably know the struggle of calculating out the times, when the next steps of your process are due. Well, struggle no more. With this App I set out to use my time during Covid-19 to solve this problem for good.

title: Command E 2.0
blurb: Your Everything Search
description: Command E is your everything search. Instantly jump to any doc or record across 30+ apps. Join your next call with one click - no more digging for the Zoom link. Grab that PDF off your desktop. Fly through your workday with one simple keyboard shortcut: cmd+e.

title: ZenML
blurb: Create reproducible machine learning pipelines
description: Ever spent hours training ML models only to have them crash and burn in production? ZenML is here to help. Track metadata, compare results, and scale to the cloud. It’s open-source, extensible, and integrates with battle-tested MLOps tooling off-the-shelf.

title: Github Wrapped 2020
blurb: View your Github contributions and other metrics for 2020!
description: Its the end of 2020. It seems like everything is getting a #wrapped - so why dont developers also get a wrapped? This is for all you makers and OSS contributors! Generate a nice little image to share on your socials to show off your #2020GithubWrapped

title: Tele AR by Spatial
blurb: 3D FaceTime with friends in AR
description: Tele is a new mobile app that lets you teleport your friends into your living room in AR/VR. We use the TrueDepth camera to do some rad real time captures of your facial expressions and throw it on your 3d avatar. It's a cool new way to chat with friends.

title: EOS icons
blurb: Open source icons made for smart applications
description: EOS icons comprises a set of free and open source icons. Handmade, using strict and consistent guidelines and processes, our icons set is an exceptionally scalable and cohesive solution that will boost the user experience in your applications and websites.

title: Klujo
blurb: Retain your audience's attention with gamified experiences
description: With so much competition and so little attention to grab onto, engaging & converting your site visitors can be difficult. Klujo enables you to create deep bonds with your audience by turning your message into personalized memorable and rewarding experiences.

title: Thankbox 2.0
blurb: Like passing a card around the office, but without the card
description: Birthday or leaving do coming up? Passing a paper card around for everyone to sign is impossible right now. With Thankbox you can do it all online. Each member of the team can add messages, images, gifs and even cash to the group card.

title: Portfoleon Timeline
blurb: Plot your projects on a timeline for free
description: A very simple tool to make a nice-looking structured timeline from a template. - Free and no email required, click to start using. - Copy and paste from Excel / Google sheets. - Custom fields. - Make lanes, add info on cards, color-code, and print.
